Uses of Class
cams.user.User

Packages that use User
Package
Description
cams.domain
A group consisting of staff and student-related classes, which represents the User domain of the application.
cams.serializer
A group of classes responsible for serializing and deserializing .xlsx files.
cams.user
A group of consisting of User and the control classes UserController, which stores all users, and AuthController which facilitates User login, logout and change password.

  • Uses of User in cams.domain

    Subclasses of User in cams.domain
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Staff
    The Staff entity class represents a staff member in the system, extending the User class.
    class 
    Student
    The Student entity class represents a student user in the system.
